Class MiniMaxNNChain<O>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.AbstractAlgorithm<R>
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.AbstractDistanceBasedAlgorithm<O,PointerPrototypeHierarchyRepresentationResult>

  • Type Parameters:

    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Algorithm, HierarchicalClusteringAlgorithm, DistanceBasedAlgorithm<O>

    @Reference(authors="F. Murtagh",title="A survey of recent advances in hierarchical clustering algorithms",booktitle="The Computer Journal 26(4)",url="https://doi.org/10.1093/comjnl/26.4.354",bibkey="DBLP:journals/cj/Murtagh83") @Reference(authors="D. M\u00fcllner",title="Modern hierarchical, agglomerative clustering algorithms",booktitle="arXiv preprint arXiv:1109.2378",url="https://arxiv.org/abs/1109.2378",bibkey="DBLP:journals/corr/abs-1109-2378")
public class MiniMaxNNChain<O>
extends AbstractDistanceBasedAlgorithm<O,PointerPrototypeHierarchyRepresentationResult>
implements HierarchicalClusteringAlgorithm
    MiniMax hierarchical clustering using the NNchain algorithm.

    Reference:

    F. Murtagh
    A survey of recent advances in hierarchical clustering algorithms
    The Computer Journal 26(4)

    D. MÃ¼llner
    Modern hierarchical, agglomerative clustering algorithms
